mapper.insert: insert into ex_order_commodity ( `ex_order_header_id`, `manufacturer`, `manufacturer_code`, `factory_article_no`, `customs_code`, `tax_refund_rate`, `ship_mark_info`, `chinese_name`, `english_name`, `declare_element`, `pkgs`, `pkgs_unit`, `total_quantity`, `total_quantity_unit`, `pack_size_length`, `pack_size_width`, `pack_size_height`, `total_volume`, `unit_rough_weight`, `total_rough_weight`, `unit_net_weight`, `total_net_weight`, `purchase_unit_price`, `purchase_total_price`, ` export_unit_price`, ` export_total_price`, `gmt_create`, `gmt_modified` ) values ( #{exOrderHeaderId}, #{manufacturer}, #{manufacturerCode}, #{factoryArticleNo}, #{customsCode}, #{taxRefundRate}, #{shipMarkInfo}, #{chineseName}, #{englishName}, #{declareElement}, #{pkgs}, #{pkgsUnit}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalQuantityUnit}, #{packSizeLength}, #{packSizeWidth}, #{packSizeHeight}, #{totalVolume}, #{unitRoughWeight}, #{totalRoughWeight}, #{unitNetWeight}, #{totalNetWeight}, #{purchaseUnitPrice}, #{purchaseTotalPrice}, #{ exportUnitPrice}, #{ exportTotalPrice}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified} )
mapper.delete:
delete from ex_order_commodity where ex_order_commodity_id in
#{exOrderCommodityId}
